name: DotInvaded
description:
FOR THE BEST PERFOMANCE I RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING THE GAME

Entry for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 all assets are made from scratch in 1 week code, sprites, music etc. 

Your spaceship is invaded by monsters ! With the help(?) of your father defeat all of the monsters.

This is a sequel to my game _Deranged :] 

WASD - Move

Mouse Left - Shoot

ESC -Game Settings and Accessibility Menu

R -Reset room

E - Talk

[IF YOU GET MOTION SICKNES YOU CAN TURN OFF THE CAMERA ROTATON IN THE ACCESSIBILITY MENU]

[IF YOU WANT AN EASIER GAME YOU CAN TURN OFF GETTING DAMAGE IN THE ACCESSIBILITY MENU]
